Package api.database.repository.event

Interface EventRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Event,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Event,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Event,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Event,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Event,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Event>, RefreshableRepository<Event,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Event,Integer>
@Repository public interface EventRepository extends RefreshableRepository<Event,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • getLastEvent

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM qds_event WHERE thread_id=:threadId AND event_type IN (\'END\',\'FORK_IN\',\'JOIN_IN\')", nativeQuery=true) Event getLastEvent(@Param("threadId") Integer threadId)

    • getFirstEvent

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM qds_event WHERE thread_id=:threadId AND event_type IN (\'START\',\'FORK_OUT\',\'JOIN_OUT\')", nativeQuery=true) Event getFirstEvent(Integer threadId)

    • deleteThreadEvents

      @Modifying @Query(value="DELETE FROM qds_event WHERE thread_id=ANY(:threadIds)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteThreadEvents(@Param("threadIds") Integer[] threadIds)

    • moveEventsBetweenThreads

      @Modifying @Query(value="UPDATE qds_event e\nSET thread_id = map.id_to\nFROM (\n SELECT unnest(:idsTo) as id_to,\n unnest(:idsFrom) as id_from\n) map\nWHERE e.thread_id = map.id_from\nAND e.event_time > :time;\n", nativeQuery=true) void moveEventsBetweenThreads(@Param("idsTo") Integer[] idsTo, @Param("idsFrom") Integer[] idsFrom, @Param("time") Integer time)

    • ensureEndEvents

      @Modifying @Query(value="WITH LastNormalEvent AS (\n SELECT thread_id, MAX(event_time) as normal_time\n FROM qds_event\n WHERE thread_id = ANY(:threadIds)\n AND event_type NOT IN (\'IDLE\', \'END\', \'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\')\n GROUP BY thread_id\n),\nLastEndEvent AS (\n SELECT e.id, e.thread_id, e.event_time\n FROM qds_event e\n JOIN LastNormalEvent n ON e.thread_id = n.thread_id\n WHERE e.event_type IN (\'END\', \'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\')\n),\nUpdateEnd AS (\n UPDATE qds_event e\n SET event_time = n.normal_time + 1,\n event_type = \'END\'\n FROM LastNormalEvent n, LastEndEvent l\n WHERE e.id = l.id\n AND e.thread_id = n.thread_id\n RETURNING e.thread_id\n)\nINSERT INTO qds_event (id, thread_id, event_time, event_type)\nSELECT nextval(\'qds_event_id_seq\'), n.thread_id, n.normal_time + 1, \'END\'\nFROM LastNormalEvent n\nWHERE NOT EXISTS (\n SELECT 1 FROM UpdateEnd u WHERE u.thread_id = n.thread_id\n)\n", nativeQuery=true) void ensureEndEvents(@Param("threadIds") Integer[] threadIds)

    • changeEventsWithoutChangesToIdle

      @Modifying @Query(value="WITH eventTypes AS (\n SELECT unnest(ARRAY[\'NORMAL\',\'GLOBAL\']) AS type\n)\nUPDATE qds_event e\nSET event_type = \'IDLE\'\nWHERE e.id IN (\n SELECT e.id\n FROM qds_event e\n JOIN qds_thread t ON e.thread_id = t.id\n LEFT JOIN qds_association_change assch ON e.id = assch.event_id\n LEFT JOIN qds_attribute_change attch ON e.id = attch.event_id\n JOIN eventTypes et ON e.event_type = et.type\n WHERE t.scenario_id = :scenarioId\n AND assch.id IS NULL AND attch.id IS NULL\n);\n", nativeQuery=true) void changeEventsWithoutChangesToIdle(@Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getThreadEvents

      @Query(value="SELECT e.id,\n :threadId as thread_id,\n e.description,\n e.title,\n e.event_time,\n e.event_type,\n e.branching_id\nFROM qds_event e WHERE thread_id=:threadId\nOR :threadId = 0 AND thread_id =\n(SELECT id FROM qds_thread t WHERE t.is_global=TRUE AND t.scenario_id=:scenarioId)\nORDER BY e.event_time\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Event> getThreadEvents(@Param("threadId") Integer threadId, @Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getScenarioEvents

      @Query(value="SELECT e.id,\n CASE\n WHEN (t.is_global = TRUE) THEN 0\n ELSE e.thread_id END as thread_id,\n e.description,\n e.title,\n e.event_time,\n e.event_type,\n e.branching_id\nFROM qds_event e\n JOIN qds_thread t ON e.thread_id = t.id\nWHERE scenario_id = :scenarioId\nORDER BY e.thread_id, e.event_time\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Event> getScenarioEvents(@Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getScenarioEventIdsInTime

      @Query(value="SELECT e.id FROM qds_event e JOIN qds_thread t ON e.thread_id = t.id WHERE event_time=:time AND scenario_id=:scenarioId", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> getScenarioEventIdsInTime(Integer scenarioId, Integer time)
